thread.title: BRIEF-First Quantum Responds To Article On Claims By Zambia Revenue Authority

title: BRIEF-First Quantum Responds To Article On Claims By Zambia Revenue Authority
text: March 20, 2018 / 7:35 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago BRIEF-First Quantum Responds To Article On Claims By Zambia Revenue Authority Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - First Quantum Minerals Ltd: * FIRST QUANTUM MINERALS RESPONDS TO NEWS ARTICLE ABOUT CLAIMS MADE BY ZAMBIA REVENUE AUTHORITY REGARDING UNDERPAYMENT OF CUSTOMS DUTIES * CONFIRMS THAT IT IS IN POSSESSION OF A LETTER FROM ZRA, DATED MARCH 19, 2018 * LETTER FROM ZRA NOTES ASSESSMENT FOR IMPORT DUTIES, PENALTIES AND INTEREST ON CONSUMABLES AND SPARE PARTS OF 76.5 BILLION ZAMBIAN KWACHA * CO “REFUTES” ZAMBIA REVENUE AUTHORITY’S ASSESSMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
